paragraphs.original: 宝玉点头道：“我也知道。如今且不用说那个。我问你：老太太那里打发人来说什么来著没有？”袭人道：“没有说什么。”宝玉道：“必是老太太忘了。明儿不是十一月初一日么？年年老太太那里必是个老规矩，要办‘消寒会’，齐打夥儿坐下，喝酒说笑。我今日已经在学房里告了假了。这会子没有信儿，明儿可是去不去呢？若去了呢，白白的告了假；若不去，老爷知道了，又说我偷懒。”袭人道：“据我说，你竟是去的是。才念的好些儿了，又想歇著。我劝你也该上点紧儿了。昨儿听见太太说，兰哥儿念书真好，他打学房里回来，还各自念书作文章，天天晚上弄到四更多天才睡。你比他大多了，又是叔叔，倘或赶不上他，又叫老太太生气，倒不如明儿早起去罢。”麝月道：“这么冷天，已经告了假又去，叫学房里说：既这么著，就不该告假呀。显见的是告谎假脱滑儿。依我说，乐得歇一天。就是老太太忘记了，偺们这里就不消寒了么？偺们也闹个会儿不好么？”袭人道：“都是你起头儿，二爷更不肯去了。”麝月道：“我也是乐一天是一天，比不得你要好名儿，使唤一个月再多得二两银子。”袭人啐道：“小蹄子儿！人家说正经话，你又来胡拉混扯的了！”麝月道：“我倒不是混拉扯，我是为你。”袭人道：“为我什么？”麝月道：“二爷上学去了，你又该咕嘟著嘴想著，巴不得二爷早些儿回来，就有说有笑的了。这会子又假撇清！何苦呢？我都看见了。”
paragraphs.english: Bao Yu nodded and said, "I know that. But there's no need to talk about that today. Look, did anyone come from Granny to tell her something? And what did they tell her?" Xisi answered, "There was no message." Bao Yu said, "Well, that means she's forgotten about it. Tomorrow is the eleventh day of the first lunar month, isn't it? Every year, Granny has a custom of holding a 'Snow Reminding Party' on this day. On that day, she invites a bunch of people and has a drinking party with them. I've already asked for leave from school today, but I don't know if Granny will write to me. If I go tomorrow, I'll have taken the leave for nothing; if I stay back, I'm afraid Father will find out that I'm slacking off." Xisi said, "From my point of view, you'd better go. You've been studying so hard, and now you want to take a break. You should continue studying harder. Yesterday, I heard Mother say that Laoyao is studying very hard. He has been reading and writing articles after returning from school, and has stayed up late into the night. You're older than he is, and you're his uncle. If you fall behind him, Granny might be unhappy. So, why don't you go tomorrow?" Xueyue said, "In this cold weather, you have already asked for leave, but you still want to go. Doesn't that mean you're asking for leave but still going? If the teachers hear about that, they will say that you're asking for leave but still going and that you're ungrateful. In my opinion, you might as well take a day off. Even if Granny forgets, we don't need to hold a 'Snow Reminding Party', do we? We can still have one, you know." Xisi said, "You'll just keep him home if you start telling him things like that." Xueyue said, "I'm only trying to make the best of the day, and I'm not trying to outshine you. If I work a few more days, I'll get paid for two more days." Xisi spat and said, "You little wench! What do you mean by saying something like that?" Xueyue said, "I'm not saying that for nothing. I'm just trying to make you happy." Xisi said, "Happy for what?" Xueyue said, "Your brother has gone to school. You're frowning, thinking that he will return quickly so that you can talk to him and laugh with him. Now, you're trying to be all high and mighty. Why? I've seen it all with my own eyes."
paragraphs.chinese: 宝玉点头说：“我知道。不过现在不用说那件事了。我问你，老太太家里有没有人来给老太太传话？传话的内容是什么？”袭人说：“没有传话的内容。”宝玉说：“那一定是老太太忘记了。明天不是十一月初一日吗？每年老太太大概都有一个规矩，在这一天办‘消寒会’。到时候，老太太会请一帮子人，一起喝酒说笑。我今天已经去学房请假了，但是现在没有老太太的信儿，明天要去，还是不去呢？如果去了，就白请了假；如果不去，又怕老爷知道了，说我偷懒。”袭人说：“据我看来，你还是去吧。你才念书念的挺好的，又想着要休息，你应该更上点紧。昨天听说太太说，兰哥儿念书挺好的，他从学房回来，还自己念书写文章，天天晚上都弄到四点多才睡。你比他大，又是叔叔，如果你赶不上他，又会让老太太生气，还是明早去吧。”麝月说：“这么冷的天，已经请了假还要去，这不等于说是你告了假又去吗？学房里听说你这么做，会说你告了假又去，说你没良心。依我看，乐得歇一天。就是老太太忘记了，我们这里就不消寒了吗？我们这里也可以办个会啊，也挺好的。”袭人说：“都是你起头，二爷更不会去了。”麝月说：“我只是乐在一天是一天，不像你要出风头，一个月多得两两银子。”袭人啐了一口，说：“你这小蹄子，人家说正经话，你又开始胡扯了！”麝月说：“我并不是胡扯，我只是为你着想。”袭人说：“我为你什么？”麝月说：“二爷上学去了，你就噘着嘴，想着二爷快点回来，和你说话、笑。这会子你又装清高，何必呢？我都看在眼里了。”

Translation:

As Jia Li'er was about to scold him, she noticed that an old lady had sent a message, saying, "The old lady said, tell Boyu that he doesn't have to go to school tomorrow. Because we invited the aunt to make him happy, perhaps all the ladies will come home. Ladies like Shi, Ling, and Bing, all invited, will come tomorrow for the 'anti-cold gathering'." Boyu, having heard only a couple sentences, happily said, "That's right! That would make Grandma the happiest! Not going to school tomorrow is like walking on a bright path." Jia Li'er didn't have much to add. The maid returned.

The term "消寒会" refers to a traditional Chinese gathering to celebrate the shortest day of the year, often involving poetry recitations or other cultural activities. paragraphs.original: 那人道：“司棋自从出去，终日啼哭。忽然那一日，他表兄来了。他母亲见了，恨的什么儿似的，说他害了司棋，一把拉住要打。那小子不敢言语。谁知司棋听见了，急忙出来，老著脸，和他母亲说：‘我是为他出来的，我也恨他没良心。如今他来了，妈要打他，不如勒死了我罢！’他妈骂他：‘不害臊的东西！你心里要怎么样？’司棋说道：‘一个女人嫁一个男人。我一时失脚，上了他的当，我就是他的人了，决不肯再跟著别人的。我只恨他为什么这么胆小？〔一身作事一身当〕，为什么逃了呢？就是他一辈子不来，我也一辈子不嫁人的。妈要给我配人，我原拚著一死。今儿他来了，妈问他怎么样。要是他不改心，我在妈跟前磕了头，只当是我死了，他到那里，我跟到那里，就是讨饭吃也是愿意的。’他妈气的了不得，便哭著骂著，说：‘你是我的女儿，我偏不给他，你敢怎么著？’那知道司棋这东西糊涂，便一头撞在墙上，把脑袋撞破，鲜血流出，竟碰死了！他妈哭著，救不过来，便要叫那小子偿命。他表兄也奇，说道：‘你们不用著急。我在外头原发了财，因想著他才回来的，心也算是真了。你们要不信，只管瞧。’说著，打怀里掏出一匣子金珠首饰来。他妈妈看见了，心软了，说：‘你既有心，为什么总不言语？’他外甥道：‘大凡女人都是水性杨花，我要说有钱，他就是贪图银钱了。如今他这为人，就是难得的。我把首饰给你们，我去买棺盛殓他。’那司棋的母亲接了东西，也不顾女孩儿了，由著外甥去。那里知道他外甥叫人抬了两口棺材来。司棋的母亲看见，诧异说：‘怎么棺材要两口？’他外甥笑道：‘一口装不下，得两口才好。’司棋的母亲见他外甥又不哭，只当是他心疼的傻了。岂知他忙著把司棋收拾了，也不啼哭，眼错不见，把带的小刀子往脖子里一抹，也就抹死了。司棋的母亲懊悔起来，倒哭的了不得。如今坊里知道了，要报官。他急了，央我来求奶奶说个人情，他再过来给奶奶磕头。”
paragraphs.english: 这个人 was speaking of Shi Qi, who had been sent away for some reason. Every day she had been weeping over it. One day, her cousin came to see her. Her mother saw him, and was furious that her daughter had gotten herself into such a mess that she had to leave her home. She dragged Shi Qi over and was about to hit her when the cousin was too frightened to say a word. But Shi Qi heard her mother's voice, and rushed out and took a thick face to speak to her mother, saying "I was sent away because I loved him, and he has no heart. If you hit him, why not let me kill myself instead!" Her mother was angry and scolded her: "Don't you know what it means to be a woman? Why did you do such a thing?" Shi Qi replied, "A woman should marry a man. I was foolish and fell for his tricks, but now I am his woman and will not go to anyone else. I just hate him for being so cowardly. (He should take responsibility for his actions and face the consequences). Why did he run away? If he never comes back, I will never marry anyone else. If you find me someone else, I would rather die. If he doesn't change his heart, I will prostrate myself in front of you, even if I die, I will follow him wherever he goes, even if I have to beg for food." Her mother was infuriated and began to cry and scold, "You are my daughter, and I will not give you to him. What can you do?" The girl was confused and ran into a wall, hitting her head and bleeding. She died! Her mother was too late to save her and wanted to make the cousin pay for it. The cousin was very surprised, and said, "Please don't worry. I came back to see her after making a lot of money, my heart was true. If you don't believe me, you can see." He took out a box of gold and pearls from his chest. Her mother saw it and softened, "If you have a heart, why didn't you say it?" The cousin replied, "Most women are greedy and would only marry for money. But her actions show her worth. I will give you these jewels, and I will buy a coffin for her." The mother took the items and left the girl. However, she saw that two coffins were brought in. She was surprised and asked, "Why are there two coffins?" The cousin smiled and said, "One coffin is not enough, I need two." Her mother was surprised to see that her cousin was not crying and thought he had become stupid from the pain. However, she did not know that he had already prepared Shi Qi's body and was not crying. He turned his eyes and took out a small knife from his body and cut his neck, also dying. Her mother was very regretful and cried. Now the people in the village want to report the incident to the police. She was very anxious and begged me to come to ask my grandmother to plead for her, so she could come and prostrate herself in front of her.
paragraphs.chinese: 这个人说：“司棋自从被派出去，每天都在哭泣。有一天，她的表哥来看她，她妈妈见了，十分生气，认为是她害了司棋，一把拉过来要打她。那小子不敢说话。谁知司棋听见了，急忙出来，厚着脸皮跟妈妈说：‘我之所以被派出去，是因为我爱上了他，我恨他没有良心。现在他来了，你要是打他，还不如让我自杀！’她妈妈骂她：‘你不知道害羞吗？你心里到底想怎样？’司棋说：‘一个女人应该嫁给一个男人。我一时不慎，上了他的当，现在我就是他的女人了，决不会再跟别人。我只恨他为什么这么胆小？（应当为自己做的事情负责），为什么逃走了呢？就是他一辈子不来，我一辈子也不嫁人。你要是给我找别人，我宁愿一死。今天他来了，你问他怎么办。如果他不改心，我就在你面前磕头，就算我死了，我跟着他到哪儿去，就算讨饭吃也愿意。’她妈妈气得不行，便哭着骂着说：‘你是我女儿，我偏不给他，你敢怎么样？’那个女孩儿糊涂，一头撞在墙上，撞破了头，流出了血，竟然死了！她妈妈哭着，救不过来，便要叫那小子偿命。那个表哥很奇怪，说：‘你们不用着急。我在外面赚了钱，因为想念她才回来的，我的真心也是真了。你们不信，可以看看。’说着，从怀里掏出一盒金珠首饰来。她妈妈看见了，心软了，说：‘你既然有心，为什么总不说话？’她表哥说：‘一般的女人都是见钱眼开，我要说有钱，她就是贪图银钱。现在她这样做，才是难得的。我把首饰给你们，我去买棺材给她收殓。’她妈妈接了东西，也不管女孩儿了，由着表哥去。谁知道她表哥叫人抬了两口棺材来。她妈妈看见了，惊讶地说：‘怎么棺材要两口？’她表哥笑道：‘一口装不下，得两口才好。’她妈妈见她表哥不哭，以为他心疼得傻了。却不知道他忙活着把司棋收拾好了，也不哭，眼睛一转，把身上带的小刀子往脖子上一抹，也就死了。她妈妈懊悔不已，哭得不得了。现在坊里的人知道了，要去报警。她很着急，央求我来找奶奶说个情，她再过来给奶奶磕头。”

paragraphs.original: 凤姐听了，诧异道：“那有这样傻丫头，偏偏的就碰见这个傻小子！怪不得那一天翻出那些东西来，他心里没事人似的，敢只是这么个烈性孩子！论起来，我也没这么大工夫管他这些闲事，但只你才说的，叫人听著，怪可怜见儿的。也罢了，你回去告诉他，我和你二爷说，打发旺儿给他撕掳就是了。”凤姐打发那人去了，才过贾母这边来。不提。
paragraphs.english: Lady Wang Xi-feng was taken aback and asked, "Where can there be such foolish servants? Fate must have brought her across one such. No wonder she was unaffected when she found those things out. She's simply too hot-tempered. I don't have time to look into such matters, but you made a good point just now. Let me know her. I'll tell your father about this. Wang Er will take care of it." Lady Wang Xi-feng dismissed the servant and came to see the Dowager Lady Jiang. This is not the end of the story.
paragraphs.chinese: 王熙凤听了，惊讶道：“哪有这等愚蠢的丫头，偏偏遇上了个愚蠢的婆子！怪不得头天里翻出那些东西，她却若无其事，敢情只是性子烈些！论起来，我也没那么多闲工夫管他这些事，只是你方才说的，听着也叫人怜悯。罢了，你回去告诉他，我和你们二爷说一声，叫旺儿给他料理就是了。”王熙凤打发那人走了，才到贾母这边来。不提。

paragraphs.original: 且说贾政这日正与詹光下大棋，通局的输赢也差不多，单为著一只角儿死活未分，在那里打结。门上的小厮进来回道：“外面冯大爷要见老爷。”贾政道：“请进来。”小厮出去请了。冯紫英走进门来，贾政忙迎著。冯紫英进来，在书房中坐下，见是下棋，便道：“只管下棋，我来观局。”詹光笑道：“晚生的棋是不堪瞧的。”冯紫英道：“好说，请下罢。”贾政道：“有什么事么？”冯紫英道：“没有什么话。老伯只管下棋，我也学几著儿。”贾政向詹光道：“冯大爷是我们相好的，既没事，我们索性下完了这一局再说话儿。冯大爷在旁边瞧著。”冯紫英道：“下采不下采？”詹光道：“下采的。”冯紫英道：“下采的是不好多嘴的。”贾政道：“多嘴也不妨，横竖他输了十来两银子，终久是不拿出来的。往后只好罚他做东便了。”詹光笑道：“这倒使得。”冯紫英道：“老伯和詹公对下么？”贾政笑道：“从前对下，他输了；如今让他两个子儿，他又输了。时常还要悔几著。不叫他悔，他就急了。”詹光也笑道：“没有的事。”贾政道：“你试试瞧。”大家一面说笑，一面下完了，收起棋来。詹光还了棋头，输了七个子儿。冯紫英道：“这盘总吃亏在打结里头。老伯结少，就便宜了。”

Now, regarding Jia Zheng, he was currently engaged in a large chess board game with Zhan Guang, and they were evenly matched in terms of winning and losing. It was just that the final piece on the board could not be determined, and they were still calculating. A servant from the guardhouse came in to announce, "Duke Feng wants to see Sir." Jia Zheng said, "Invite him in." The servant went out to make the announcement. Feng Zuiying entered, and Jia Zheng hurriedly went to greet him. Feng Zuiying sat in the study and saw them playing chess. He said, "Continue playing, I'll watch from the side." Zhan Guang smiled and said, "My chess is not worth watching." Feng Zuiying said, "Very well, continue playing." Jia Zheng asked, "Is there anything you need?" Feng Zuiying replied, "No, nothing. Uncle, just keep playing the game, I'll learn a few moves from you." Jia Zheng told Zhan Guang, "Duke Feng is our good friend. Since there's nothing else, we'll finish this game and then talk. Duke Feng, you can watch." Feng Zuiying asked, "Do you still need to play?" Zhan Guang replied, "Yes, we do." Feng Zuiying said, "Players shouldn't be talking too much." Jia Zheng said, "It's fine to talk too much, he's already lost over a dozen silver pieces, and he won't take them out. We can just punish him by making him host a party in the future." Zhan Guang smiled and said, "That's a good idea." Feng Zuiying asked, "Does Uncle and Mr. Jian play together?" Jia Zheng smiled and said, "Previously, we played together, he lost. Now, let him move two steps first, he still loses. He keeps second-guessing his moves, if we don't let him, he'll get anxious." Zhan Guang also smiled and said, "That's not the case." Jia Zheng said, "Try it out." Everyone laughed as they finished the game and put away the chess pieces. Zhan Guang returned the chess pieces and lost seven points. Feng Zuiying said, "This game always loses because of getting stuck. Uncle's fewer steps in the game make him have an advantage."

paragraphs.original: 贾政对冯紫英道：“有罪，有罪，偺们说话儿罢。”冯紫英道：“小侄与老伯久不见面。一来会会，二来因广西的同知进来引见，带了四种洋货，可以做得贡的。一件是围屏，有二十四扇槅子，都是紫檀雕刻的。中间虽说不是玉，却是绝好的硝子石，石上镂出山水、人物、楼台、花鸟儿来。一扇上有五六十个人，都是宫妆的女子。－－名为‘汉宫春晓’。人的眉、目、口、鼻以及出手、衣褶，刻得又清楚，又细腻。点缀布置，都是好的。我想尊府大观园中正厅上恰好用的著。还有一架钟表，有三尺多高，也是一个童儿拿著时辰牌，到什么时候儿，就报什么时辰；里头还有消息人儿打十番儿。这是两件重笨的，却还没有拿来。现在我带在这里的两件，却倒有些意思儿。”就在身边拿出一个锦匣子来，用几重白绫裹著，揭开了绵子，第一层是一个玻璃盒子，里头金托子，大红绉绸托底，上放著一颗桂圆大的珠子，光华耀目。冯紫英道：“据说这就叫做‘母珠’。”因叫：〔拿一个盘儿来。”
paragraphs.english: Jia Zheng said to Feng Ziying, "I have done wrong, I have done wrong; let's talk it over." Feng Ziying replied, "We haven't met for a long time; let's meet now. And there is also the matter of the civil governor of Guangxi Province who is coming to recommend people for the imperial court. He has brought four foreign goods, which can be used as tributes. The first is a folding screen, which has twenty-four lattice windows, all carved from purple sandalwood. In the middle, though not jade, it is a fine piece of nianrui stone, which is carved with mountains, rivers, pavilions, flowers, birds, and fifty-six women in court dress. The carvings of their eyebrows, eyes, mouths, noses, and the folds of their clothes are clear and delicate. The arrangement and design are both good. I think it would suit the main hall of your Master of the Orchid Hall. The second is a clock, which is three feet tall, and a little boy carries the time table and rings the gong at the proper time. Inside, there is a clockmaker who strikes the drum and drums out a ten-play tune. These are two bulky items, which are still at my place. But the two I have brought with me are more interesting." He took out a silk box from his side, wrapped with several layers of white silk. He lifted the silk and found inside a glass case, which had a golden base, a red silk cushion, and a large pearl, as big as a tangerine. The light reflected off the pearl was dazzling. Feng Ziying said, "It's said that this is called a mother pearl." He called out, "Bring a plate!"

paragraphs.original: 詹光即忙端过一个黑漆茶盘，道：“使得么？”冯紫英道：“使得。”便又向怀里掏出一个白绢包儿，将包儿里的珠子都倒在盘里散著，把那颗母珠搁在中间，将盘放于桌上。看见那些小珠子儿，滴溜滴溜的都滚到大珠子身边，回来把这颗大珠子抬高了，别处的小珠子一颗也不剩，都粘在大珠上。詹光道：“这也奇怪！”贾政道：“这是有的，所以叫做母珠，原是珠之母。”
paragraphs.english: Jiang Guang hurriedly brought over a black lacquer tea tray and said, "Is this acceptable?" Feng Ziyin replied, "Yes." Then, he took out another white silk bag from his pocket, poured out the pearls inside onto the tray, and placed the mother pearl in the center. He then set the tray on the table. Seeing the small pearls rolling around and clustering around the large pearl, he returned and raised the large pearl, leaving not a single other pearl scattered on the tray. Jiang Guang exclaimed, "This is truly peculiar!" Jia Zheng explained, "This is a common occurrence, which is why it's called a mother pearl. It is originally the mother of all pearls."
paragraphs.chinese: 詹光连忙端过一个黑漆茶盘来，道：“可以吗？”冯紫英道：“可以。”于是又从怀里掏出一个白绢包儿来，将包儿里的珠子都倒在盘里散着，把那颗母珠搁在中间，然后将盘放于桌上。看见那些小珠子儿，滴溜溜的都滚到大珠子身边，回来把这颗大珠子抬高了，别处的小珠子一颗也不剩，都粘在大珠上。詹光道：“这真奇怪！”贾政道：“这是常见的现象，所以叫做母珠，本来是珠子的母体。”

paragraphs.original: 那冯紫英又回头看著他跟来的小厮道：“那个匣子呢？”小厮赶忙捧过一个花梨木匣子来。大家打开看时，原来匣内衬著虎纹锦，锦上叠著一束蓝纱。詹光道：“这是什么东西？”冯紫英道：“这叫做‘鲛绡帐’。”在匣子里拿出来时，叠得长不满五寸，厚不上半寸。冯紫英一层一层的打开，打到十来层，已经桌上铺不下了。冯紫英道：“你看，里头还有两褶，必得高屋里去，才张得下。这就是鲛丝所织。暑热天气，张在堂屋里头，苍蝇蚊子一个不能进来，又轻又亮。”贾政道：“不用全打开，怕叠起来倒费事。”詹光便与马紫英一层一层摺好收拾了。冯紫英道：“这四件东西，价儿也不贵，两万银他就卖。母珠一万，鲛绡帐五千，‘汉宫春晓’与自鸣钟五千。”贾政道：“那里买的起！”冯紫英道：“你们是个国戚，难道宫里头用不著么？贾政道：“用得著的很多，只是那里有这些银子？等我叫人拿进去给老太太瞧瞧。”冯紫英道：“很是。”
paragraphs.english: Feng Ziyin asked the servant who had accompanied him: "Where's the case?" The servant held up a box made of magnolia. Everyone opened it to have a look. The inside of the box was padded with tiger-striped silk, on which was piled a bundle of blue lace. Zhan Guo asked: "What's this?" Feng Ziyin replied: "It's a lace canopy." When it was taken out of the box, it was folded to about five inches long and half an inch thick. Feng Ziyin unfolded it layer by layer. By the tenth layer, it was already too thick to fit on the table. Feng Ziyin said: "Look, there are two more layers inside. It has to be hung up on a high place. This is made of the silk of the weaverfish. It's perfect for hot weather. You can hang it in the middle of the room and not a single mosquito or housefly will get in. It's light and translucent." Jia Zheng said: "I don't need to open it all. I'm afraid it will be a hassle to fold it up again." Zhan Guo and Ma Ziyin put the things away. Feng Ziyin said: "These four things cost not much money. The pearls are 10,000 taels, the lace canopy 5,000 taels, the 'Spring in the Imperial Palace' and the alarm clock 5,000 taels each." Jia Zheng said: "I can't afford them!" Feng Ziyin replied: "You're a member of the imperial family. Don't tell me you can't afford to buy things for the palace?" Jia Zheng said: "We need them for many things, but where are we to get this kind of money? I'll have to ask someone to bring it in to give to the old lady to have a look." Feng Ziyin said: "That's a good idea."
paragraphs.chinese: 冯紫英又问跟来的小厮：“那匣子呢？”小厮捧来一只花梨木盒子。大家打开来看，里头衬着虎纹锦，锦上叠着一束蓝纱。詹光问：“这是什么？”冯紫英答：“鲛绡帐。”从盒子里拿出来，叠得长不过五寸，厚不过半寸。冯紫英一层一层打开，到十来层，已经放不下桌面。冯紫英说：“你看，里头还有两层。得找高处才张得下。这是鲛丝织的。暑热天气，张在堂屋里，苍蝇蚊子一个都进不来，又轻又亮。”贾政说：“不用全打开，怕叠起来倒费事。”詹光与马紫英把东西叠好收拾起来。冯紫英说：“这四样东西，价钱也不贵，母珠一万，鲛绡帐五千，‘汉宫春晓’与自鸣钟五千。”贾政说：“哪里买得起！”冯紫英说：“你们是国戚，难道宫里用不着么？贾政说：“用得着的很多，只是哪里有这些银子？等我叫人拿进去给老太太瞧瞧。”冯紫英说：“好主意。”

paragraphs.original: 贾政便著人叫贾琏把这两件东西送到老太太那边去，并叫人请了邢、王二夫人、凤姐儿都来瞧著，又把两件东西一一试过。贾琏道：“他还有两件：一件是围屏，一件是乐钟。共总要卖二万银子呢。”凤姐儿接著道：“东西自然是好的，但是那里有这些闲钱？偺们又不比外任督抚要办贡。我已经想了好些年了，像偺们这种人家，必得置些不动摇的根基才好：或是祭地，或是义庄，再置些坟屋。往后子孙遇见不得意的事，还是点儿底子，不到一败涂地。我的意思是这样，不知老太太、老爷、太太们怎么样？若是外头老爷们要买只管买。”贾母与众人都说：“这话说的倒也是。”贾琏道：“还了他罢。原是老爷叫我送给老太太瞧，为的是宫里好进。谁说买来搁在家里？老太太还没开口，你便说了一大堆丧气话。”说著，便把两件东西拿出去了，告诉了贾政，只说：“老太太不要。”便与冯紫英道：“这两件东西好可好，就只没银子。我替你留心，有要买的人，我便送信给你去。”冯紫英只得收拾好了，坐下说些闲话，没有兴头，就要起身。贾政道：“你在这里吃了晚饭去罢。”冯紫英道：“罢了。来了就叨扰老伯吗？”贾政道：“说那里的话！”正说著，人回：“大老爷来了。”贾赦早已进来。彼此相见，叙些寒温。
paragraphs.english: Jia Zheng ordered Jia Lian to take these two articles into the inner courtyard. He summoned the wives of Jing and Wang, together with the concubine Feng, and had them take a look. He also called in servants to test the articles one by one. Jia Lian said, "The things are indeed good, but we do not have enough money to buy them. Our family does not work in the capital, and we have plenty of land. It would not be necessary to buy such things, and we should spend the money on land to build temple grounds, charitable establishments, and tomb houses so that our descendants will have some place to retreat to when they are in need. I think this is a good idea, but I wonder if the others agree." Grandmother Jia, as well as the two ladies, all agreed that this was a good idea. Jia Lian said, "I will take them for now, since they were for Grandmother Jia to look at. Perhaps she will want to send them as a gift to the palace. It would be very ungracious of me to say that I want to keep them for myself. Since Grandmother Jia did not ask, you have no right to say that we do not want them." Finished with his task, he took the articles out of the room, told Jia Zheng, "Grandmother Jia does not want them," and then said to Feng Zhiying, "The articles are good, but I do not have the money. I will keep an eye out for someone who wants to buy them." Feng Zhiying put the articles away and sat down for a while, but could not find anything to talk about. He said he would be leaving. Jia Zheng said, "You should stay for dinner." Feng Zhiying replied, "I have already eaten. I should not bother the old man." Jia Zheng said, "Of course you should not be bothered!" Then the man came in and said, "The elder brother has arrived." Jia Shi came in and they greeted each other. They then talked for a while. Then the man said, "The high court official is here." Jia Shi came in. They greeted each other and talked for a while. The man came in again and said, "The high court official is here." Jia Shi came in again and talked for a while. After the meal, they all said their farewells.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政便叫贾琏把这两件东西送进内院去，并叫了邢王二位夫人与凤姐儿进来一起瞧，又叫人一件一件试了试。贾琏说：“东西虽好，但没有这么多闲钱，咱家又不是在外做官的，好大的田产，可以不用置买这些东西，置买些祭地、义庄、坟屋，好让子孙们在世的时候有点儿退路。这是我所想的，不知各位意下如何？”贾母与二位夫人皆说：“这确是条好主意。”贾琏说：“我收下吧，原是叫我去给老太太瞧瞧，好给宫里进贡，谁说买了搁在家里？老太太还没开口，你倒说了一大堆丧气话。”说完，把东西拿了出去，告诉了贾政，说：“老太太不要。”然后对冯紫英说：“这两样东西很好，只是没银子。我替你留心，如果有愿意买的，我再通知你。”冯紫英收好东西，坐下来闲聊一会儿，没什么意思，便要告辞。贾政说：“你就留下来吃饭吧。”冯紫英说：“不必了，来了也打扰老伯了。”贾政说：“哪里的话！”这时，进来人说：“大老爷来了。”贾赦进来，彼此见了面，叙了寒温。

paragraphs.original: 不一时，摆上酒来，肴馔罗列，大家喝著酒。至四五巡后，说起洋货的话。冯紫英道：“这种货本是难消的。除非要像尊府这样人家，还可消得，其馀就难了。”贾政道：“这也不见得。”贾赦道：“我们家里也比不得从前了，这回儿也不过是个空门面。”
paragraphs.english:
不久，酒菜都摆上了，大家边吃边喝。喝到第四、第五轮，才提起洋货。冯紫英说：“这种货不像一般的货物，很难销，除非像贵府这样的大家庭，还能销得出去，其它就难了。”贾政说：“未必是这样的。”贾赦说：“我们家里的情况也比不上以前了，这会儿只不过是个空架子。”

In a short while, the food and drink were all set out, and everyone ate and drank together. After the fourth and fifth rounds of drinking, the conversation turned to foreign goods. Feng Zying said, "These goods are not like ordinary merchandise, they are hard to sell, unless it is a large family like yours that can sell them, otherwise it is very difficult." Jia Zheng said, "That may not be the case." Jia Pai said, "Our family's situation is not as good as it used to be, we are just an empty shell now."
paragraphs.chinese: 没过多久，酒菜都摆上了，大家边吃边喝。喝到第四第五轮，才提起洋货。冯紫英说：“这种货不像一般的货物，很难销，除非像贵府这样的大家庭，还能销得出去，其它就难了。”贾政说：“未必是这样的。”贾赦说：“我们家里的情况也比不上以前了，这会儿只不过是个空架子。”

paragraphs.original: 冯紫英又问：“东府珍大爷可好么？我前儿见他，说起家常话儿来，提到他令郎续娶的媳妇远不及头里那位秦氏奶奶了。如今后娶的到底是那一家的？我也没有问起。”贾政道：“我们这个侄孙媳妇儿也是这里大家，从前做过京畿道的胡老爷的女孩儿。”冯紫英道：“胡道长我是知道的。但是他家教上也不怎么样。也罢了，只要姑娘好就好。”
paragraphs.english: The next day, Feng Zying asked Jia Zheng, "How is Uncle Zhen? The last time I met him, he spoke about his new wife, saying she's not even as good as his old wife, Qin. Who did he marry now? I didn't ask." Jia Zheng replied, "This daughter-in-law of mine is from a reputable family, the daughter of Master Hu from the jurisdiction of the capital." Feng Zying said, "Master Hu the Daoist priest, I know him. But their family doesn't have much refinement. Never mind, as long as the girl is good."
paragraphs.chinese: 冯紫英又问贾政：“东府珍大爷好吗？我前天见到他时，与他谈起家常，说起他新娶的儿媳妇连原来的秦氏都不如。现在娶的是谁家的？我没有问起。”贾政答道：“我们这位侄孙媳妇也是大家出身，以前是京畿道胡老爷的女儿。”冯紫英说：“胡道长我认识。但是他们家的教养一般。算了，只要姑娘好就行。”

paragraphs.original: 贾琏道：“听得内阁里人说起，雨村又要升了。”贾政道：“这也好。不知准不准？”贾琏道：“大约有意思的了。”冯紫英道：“我今儿从吏部里来，也听见这样说。雨村老先生是贵本家不是？”贾政道：“是。”冯紫英道：“是有服的？还是无服的？”贾政道：“说也话长。他原籍是浙江湖州府人，流寓到苏州，甚不得意。有个甄士隐和他相好，时常周济他。以后中了进士，得了榜下知县，便娶了甄家的丫头。如今的太太不是正配。岂知甄士隐弄到零落不堪，没有找处。雨村革了职以后，那时还与我家并未相识。只因舍妹丈林如海林公在扬州巡盐的时候，请他在家做西席，外甥女儿是他的学生。因他有起复的信，要进京来，恰好外甥女儿要上来探亲，林姑老爷便托他照应上来的。还有一封荐书托我吹嘘吹嘘。那时看他不错，大家常会。岂知雨村也奇：我家世袭起，从‘代’字辈下来，宁荣两宅，人口房舍，以及起居事宜，一概都明白。因此，遂觉得亲热了。”因又笑说道：“几年间门子也会钻了，由知府推升转了御史，不过几年，升了吏部侍郎，兵部尚书。为著一件事降了三级，如今又要升了。”
paragraphs.english:
Jialin said, "I heard that people at the court are saying that Yu Cun has been given a promotion." Jia Zheng said, "That is good. But I wonder if it will really happen." Jialin said, "This time it might happen." Feng Ziqing said, "I heard from the Department of Administration today that there may be a promotion. Is Master Yu from a wealthy family?" Jia Zheng said, "Yes." Feng Ziqing said, "Is he related or not?" Jia Zheng said, "This is complicated. Master Yu was originally from the city of Huzhou in Zhejiang Province. He later lived in Suzhou, where he was not successful. There was a man named Zhang Shiyin who befriended him, often helping him out. Later, Yu passed the civil service exams and became a county magistrate. He then married a maid from the Zhang household. His current wife is not his first wife. It was a surprise that Zhang Shiyin's household became bankrupt and he had nowhere to go. After Yu was dismissed, our families did not know each other. It was at that time that my nephew Lin Rugai was appointed Tax Commissioner of Yangzhou. He asked Yu to teach his niece in the household. The niece was one of Yu's students. He got a letter saying he might be recalled to the capital, and his niece was coming to visit. Lin Rugai asked Yu to help bring her here. He also asked me to help promote him. At that time, I found him to be a good man. We often spent time together. Who would have thought that Yu was so lucky: When our family line started, it was from the ‘Dai’ generation. The Ning and Rong households, their number of people, houses, furnishings, and living arrangements are all clear to me. Therefore, we feel close." He laughed again. "The boy has really worked hard; he has gone from a county magistrate to a censors, and then to a deputy minister in the Department of Administration. After being demoted three times, he's going to be promoted again."

paragraphs.chinese: 贾琏说：“我听说内阁里的人说，雨村又要升官了。”贾政说：“这可是好事。不知道会不会成。”贾琏说：“说不定这回真的能成。”冯紫英说：“我今天从吏部来，也听见这样说法。雨村老先生是贵家亲戚吧？”贾政说：“是的。”冯紫英说：“是有关系的？还是没关系的？”贾政说：“这话就复杂了。雨村老先生原籍浙江湖州府人氏，后来流落到苏州，很是不得意。有个甄士隐和他交好，时常周济他。后来雨村考中进士，当了知县，便娶了甄家的丫鬟。如今的夫人不是正妻。谁料想甄士隐弄得家破人亡，没处可去。雨村被革职以后，那时和我家并未相识。只因我外甥女婿林如海在扬州做巡盐御史的时候，请雨村在府上当西席。外甥女是他的学生。因他有重新启用的信，要进京来，恰好外甥女要来探亲，林如海便托雨村照应上来。还有一封荐书托我帮忙吹嘘。那时看他不错，大家常聚一堂。岂料雨村也真神了：我家世袭起，从‘代’字辈下来，宁荣两宅，人口房舍，以及起居事宜，一概都清楚。因此，便觉得亲近了。”于是又笑道：“几年间门子也会钻营，由知府升迁转为御史，不过几年，升为吏部侍郎，兵部尚书。为一件事降了三级，如今又要升了。”

paragraphs.original: 冯紫英道：“人世的荣枯，仕途的得失，总属难定。”贾政道：“天下事都是一个样的理哟。比如方才那珠子，那颗大的，就像有福气的人似的，那些小的都托赖著他的灵气护庇著。要是那大的没有了，那些小的也就没有收揽了。就像人家儿当头人有了事，骨肉也都分离了，亲戚也都零落了，就是好朋友也都散了。转瞬荣枯，真似春云秋叶一般。你想做官有什么趣儿呢？像雨村算便宜的了。还有我们差不多的人家儿，就是甄家，从前一样功勋，一样世袭，一样起居，我们也是时常来往。不多几年，他们进京来，差人到我这里请安，还很热闹。一会儿抄了原籍的家财，至今杳无音信。不知他近况若何，心下也著实惦记著。”
paragraphs.english: Feng Zying said, "The ups and downs of fortune and the rise and fall of the official ranks are already hard to predict in the mortal world." Jia Zhen said, "All of the world's matters are the same, like that pearl. The larger one is like those who are blessed with fortune, while the smaller ones are protected by their vital energy. If the larger one disappears, the smaller ones will lose their support. Just like the head of a family falls ill, the family members will disperse, friends will become estranged, and even good friends will part. The ups and downs of fortune are like the transient clouds of spring and the leaves of autumn. What's the point of serving as an official? Yu Cun was already considered fortunate. What about our close kin, like the Jins? In the past, they had the same merit, hereditary rank, and way of life. We were quite familiar with them. But it didn't take long before they were seized and their family was destroyed. No word has been heard from them since. We're concerned for their present condition."
paragraphs.chinese: 冯紫英说：“人世间的荣辱和仕途的升迁，本来就难以确定。”贾政道：“天下的事都一样，就像那颗珠子，大的就像有福气的人，小的都靠他的灵气保护着。如果大的没有了，那些小的也就没有了依傍。就像一家的头儿有了事情，家里的人都要分散，亲戚朋友也都要零落，就连好朋友也都要散去。荣辱之间，就像春云秋叶，转瞬即逝。做官有什么意思呢？像雨村已经算是便宜的了。还有我们差不多的人家，比如甄家，从前功勋一样，世袭一样，起居一样，我们也是常来往的。没过多久，他们家在京城里抄了家，至今音信全无。不知道他们现在怎么样，心里很惦记他们。”

paragraphs.original: 贾赦道：“什么珠子？”
paragraphs.english: 在中文句子中，"贾赦说"可以被直接翻译为"贾赦问"，表示贾赦在询问。而句子“什么珠子？”本身就是一个问句，询问特定的珠子信息。因此，为了保持句子结构和意义的一致性，答案应翻译为“贾赦问，‘什么珠子？’”。这样的翻译既保持了原文的疑问语气，也体现了人物之间的对话场景。
paragraphs.chinese:
贾赦说：“什么珠子？”
贾赦问，“什么珠子？”
贾赦说，“什么珠子？”
答案为：贾赦问，“什么珠子？”

paragraphs.original: 贾政同冯紫英又说了一遍给贾赦听。贾赦道：“偺们家是再没有事的。”冯紫英道：“果然尊府是不怕的：一则里头有贵妃照应；二则故旧好，亲戚多；三则你们家自老太太起，至于少爷们，没有一个刁钻刻薄的。”贾政道：“虽无刁钻刻薄的，却没有德行才情。白白的衣租食税，那里当得起？”贾赦道：“偺们不用说这些话，大家吃酒罢。”大家又喝了几杯，摆上饭来。吃毕喝茶。
paragraphs.english: Jia Zheng and Feng Zhiying repeated the matter to Jia Shai. Jia Shai said, "There won't be any such thing in our family." Feng Zhiying said, "Indeed, such a thing won't happen in your family. Firstly, Empress Xizi is in the palace watching over you. Secondly, you have so many relatives and friends. Thirdly, there isn't a single spiteful and mean person in your household." Jia Zheng said, "We may not have any spiteful or mean people, but we lack virtue and talent. How can we deserve to take the country's food and taxes?" Jia Shai said, "Let's not talk about this anymore, let's drink." They then drank a few more cups of wine before having their meal. After the meal, they drank tea.
paragraphs.chinese: 贾政和冯紫英又把这件事说了一遍给贾赦听。贾赦说：“我们家不会有这事的。”冯紫英说：“果然贵府不会有事的：一是因为贵妃在宫中照应；二是因为你们家亲戚朋友多；三是因为府中上下没有一个刁钻刻薄的人。”贾政说：“我们虽没有刁钻刻薄的人，却也没有德行和才情。白白地领着国家的粮食和租税，怎么当得起？”贾赦说：“我们不必说这些了，大家喝酒吧。”于是又喝了几杯酒，开饭了。饭后喝茶。

paragraphs.original: 冯家的小厮走来轻轻的向紫英说了一句，冯紫英便要告辞。贾赦问那小厮道：“你说什么？”小厮道：“外面下雪，早已下了梆子了。”贾政叫人看时，已是雪深一寸多了。贾政道：“那两件东西，你收拾好了么？”冯紫英道：“收好了。若尊府要用，价钱还自然让些。”贾政道：“我留神就是了。”紫英道：“我再听信罢。天气冷，请罢，别送了。”贾赦贾政便命贾琏送了出去。
paragraphs.english: Feng Ziyin's servant came over and whispered something in his ear. Ziyin seemed to wish to withdraw. Ji Shige asked the servant, "What did you say?" The servant answered, "It snowed outside, and the gong has been striking." Jia Zheng sent someone to check and saw that it had snowed an inch. He then asked, "Have the two items been put away?" Feng Ziyin replied, "Yes. If Your Mansion wishes to use them, the price can be lowered." Jia Zheng said, "I'll be on the lookout." Ziyin said, "I'll await your news. It's cold, so don't send them. I'll have them come back." Ji Shige and Ji Zheng asked Jia Lin to see Feng Ziyin off.
paragraphs.chinese: 冯紫英的小厮走过来，轻声的对紫英说了句什么，紫英便想告辞。贾赦便问小厮：“你说什么？”小厮道：“外面下了雪，梆子都响了。”贾政叫人去瞧，已经下雪一寸多了。贾政便问：“那两件东西收拾好了没有？”冯紫英道：“收拾好了。如果贵府要用，价钱自然可以减让。”贾政道：“我留心就是了。”紫英道：“我再听你的信。天气冷了，别送了，我请回去罢。”贾赦贾政便叫贾琏送紫英回去。

paragraphs.original: 未知后事如何，下回分解。
paragraphs.english:
中文：不知后来怎么样，下回再说。
翻译成英文：I don't know how it turned out later, let's talk about it next time.
paragraphs.chinese: 不知后来怎么样，下回再说。

title: 《评女传巧姐慕贤良　玩母珠贾政参聚散》
